required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Trial of YuWell YE660D Blood Pressure Monitor in General Population According to the ISO 81060-2:2018
clinical_study.official_title: Validation of the YuWell YE660D Oscillometric Upper-arm Blood Pressure Monitor for Clinic and Home in General Population According to the AAMI/ESH/ISO Universal Standard (ISO 81060-2:2018)

lead_sponsor.agency: The Second Hospital of Nanjing Medical University

collaborator.agency: Jiangsu Yuyue medical equipment & supply Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: The Second Hospital of Nanjing Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the accuracy of the YuWell YE660D oscillometric upper-arm blood pressure monitor for clinic and home in general population according to the Association for the Advancement of Medical Instrumentation/European Society of Hypertension/International Organization for Standardization (AAMI/ESH/ISO) Universal Standard (ISO 81060-2:2018).

arm_group.description: Blood Pressure Measurement with the YuWell YE660D Electronic Sphygmomanometer (YuWell YE660D) and with Desk Mercury Sphygmomanometer.

intervention.description: Measurement blood pressure by YuWell YE660D Electronic Sphygmomanometer and Desk Mercury Sphygmomanometer

overall_official.affiliation: The Second Hospital of Nanjing Medical University

facility.name: The Second Affiliated Hospital of Nanjing Medical University

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: The Second Hospital of Nanjing Medical University
